GSP33brssbh1u:1382: bhāgo 'tyantatejasvī tattulyaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ yathātyantadīptimattathāsya devasyākṣiṇī prakṛṣṭadīptimatī,
GSP33brssbh1u:1383: tasya uditīti udita udgataḥ sakāryasarvapāpāspṛṣṭa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:1385: amuṣmādādityādūrdhvagā ye lokāsteṣāmīśitā ye ca devānāṃ kāmā bhogāsteṣāṃ cetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:1390: 'ya āditye tiṣṭhannādityāntaro yamādityo na veda yasyādityaḥ śarīraṃ ya ādityamantaro yamayatyeṣa ta ātmāntaryāmyamṛtaḥ' (bṛ. 3.7.9)
GSP33brssbh1u:1392: tatra hi 'ādityādantaro yamādityo na veda' iti vediturādityādvijñānātmano 'ntaryāmī spaṣṭaṃ nirdiśyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:1398: idamāmananti- 'asya lokasya kā gatirityākāśa iti hovāca sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtānyākāśādeva
GSP33brssbh1u:1399: samutpadyanta ākāśaṃ pratyastaṃ yantyākāśo hyevaibhyo jyāyānākāśaḥ parāyaṇam' (chāndo. 1.9.1) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1400: tatra saṃśayaḥ- kimākāśaśabdena paraṃ brahmābhidhīyata uta bhūtākāśamiti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1407: iti 'ākāśo vai nāma nāmarūpayornirvahitā te yadantarā tadbrahma' (chā. 8.14.1)
GSP33brssbh1u:1412: kutaḥ, taddhi prasiddhatareṇa prayogeṇa śīghraṃ buddhimārohati /
GSP33brssbh1u:1419: nanu bhūtākāśaparigrahe vākyaśeṣo nopapadyate- 'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtānyākāśādeva samutpadyante' ityādiḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:1426: tasmādākāśaśabdena bhūtākāśasya grahaṇamityevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ- 'ākāśastalliṅgāt' ākāśaśabdena brahmaṇo grahaṇaṃ yuktam /
GSP33brssbh1u:1428: parasya hi brahmaṇa idaṃ liṅgam- 'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtānyākāśādeva samutpadyante' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1434: tathā 'ākāśaṃ pratyastaṃ yanti' iti brahmaliṅgaṃ 'ākāśo hyevaibhyo jyāyānākāśaḥ parāyaṇam' iti ca jyāyastvaparāyaṇatve /
GSP33brssbh1u:1435: jyāyastvaṃ hyānāpekṣikaṃ paramātmanyevaikasminnāmnātam- 'jyāyānpṛthivyā jyāyamantarikṣājjyāyāndivo jyāyānebhyo lokebhyaḥ' (chāṃ 3.14.3) iti
GSP33brssbh1u:1437: śrutiśca bhavati- 'vijñānamānandaṃ brahma rāterdātuḥ parāyaṇam' (bṛ. 3.9.28) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1440: taṃ cākāśamudgīthe saṃpādyopasaṃharati- 'sa eṣa parovarīyānudgīthaḥ sa eṣo 'nantaḥ' (chāṃ 1.9.2) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1442: yatpunaruktaṃ bhūtākāśaṃ prasiddhibalena prathamataraṃ pratīyata iti,
GSP33brssbh1u:1443: atra brūmaḥ- prathamataraṃ pratītamapi sat vākyaśeṣagatānbrahmaguṇāndṛṣṭvā na parigṛhyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:1444: darśitaśca brahmaṇyapyākāśaśabdaḥ- 'ākāśo vai nāma nāmarūpayornirvahitā' ityādau /
GSP33brssbh1u:1445: tathākāśaparyāyavācināmapi brahmaṇi prayogo dṛśyate- 'ṛco akṣare parame vyomandevā adhi viśve niṣeduḥ' (ṛ.saṃ 1.164.39)
GSP33brssbh1u:1457: te nāmarūpe yadantarā yasmādanye yasya vā madhye staḥ tannāmarūpāspṛṣṭaṃ brahmeti vākyoṣādatrākāśo brahmetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:1466: ṛco ṛgupakṣitāḥ sarve vedā jñāpakāḥ santi /
GSP33brssbh1u:1470: udgīthe- 'prastotaryā devatā prastāvamanvāyattā' ityupakramya śrūyate- katamā sā
GSP33brssbh1u:1471: devateti prāṇā iti hovāca sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtāni prāṇamevābhisaṃviśanti prāṇamabhyujjihate
GSP33brssbh1u:1478: ata iha prāṇaśabdena katarasyopādānaṃ yuktamiti bhavati saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:1482: nanu pūrvavadihāpi talliṅgādbrahmaṇa eva grahaṇaṃ yuktam /
GSP33brssbh1u:1483: ihāpi vākyaśeṣe bhūtānāṃ saṃveśanodgamanaṃ pārameśvaraṃ karma pratīyate / na /
GSP33brssbh1u:1485: evaṃ hyāmnāyate- 'yadā vai puruṣaḥ svapiti prāṇaṃ tarhi vāgapyete prāṇaṃ cakṣuḥ prāṇaṃ manaḥ sa yadā prabudhyate prāṇadevādhi punarjāyante' (śa.brā. 10.3.3.6)
GSP33brssbh1u:1486: iti. pratyakṣaṃ caitatsvāpakāle prāṇavṛttāvaparilupyamānāyāmindriyavṛttayaḥ parilupyante prabodhakāle ca prādurbhavantīti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1487: indriyasāratvācca bhūtānāmaviruddho mukhye prāṇe 'pi bhūtasaṃveśanodgamanavādī vākyaśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:1490: tatsāmānyācca prāṇasyāpi na brahmatvamityevaṃ prāpte sūtrakāra āha- 'ata eva prāṇaḥ' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1492: ata eva talliṅgātprāṇaśabdamapi paraṃ brahma bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssbh1u:1493: prāṇasyāpi hi brahmaliṅgasaṃbandhaḥ śrūyate- 'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtāni prāṇamevābhisaṃviśanti prāṇamabhyujjihate' (chāṃ 1.115) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1494: prāṇanimittau sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāmutpattipralayāvucyamānau prāṇasya brahmatāṃ gamayataḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:1497: atrocyate- svāpaprabodhayorindriyāṇāmeva kevalānāṃ prāṇāśrayaṃ saṃveśanodgamanaṃ dṛśyate,
GSP33brssbh1u:1499: ihatu sendriyāṇāṃ saśarīrāṇāṃ ca jīvāviṣṭānāṃ bhūtānāṃ,
GSP33brssbh1u:1500: 'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtāni' iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:1502: nanu sahāpi viṣayairindriyāṇāṃ svāpaprabodhayoḥ prāṇe 'pyayaṃ prāṇācca prabhavaṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:1503: śṛṇumaḥ- 'yadā suptaḥsvapnaṃ na kañcana paśyatyathāsminprāṇa evaikadhā bhavati tadainaṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:1516: yathā pituḥ piteti prayoge 'nyaḥ pitā ṣaṣṭīnirdiṣṭo 'nyaḥ prathamānirdiṣṭaḥ pituḥ piteti gamyate,
GSP33brssbh1u:1517: tadvat 'prāṇasya prāṇam' iti śabdabhedātprasiddhātprāṇādanyaḥ prāṇasya prāṇa iti niścīyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:1518: nahi sa eva tasyeti bhedanirdeśārhe bhavati /
GSP33brssbh1u:1519: yasya ca prakaraṇe yo nirdiśyate nāmāntareṇāpi sa eva tatra prakaraṇī nirdiṣṭa iti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:1520: yathā jyotiṣṭomādhikāre- 'vasante vasante jyotiṣā yajeta' ityatra jyotiḥśabdo jyotiṣṭomaviṣayo bhavati,
GSP33brssbh1u:1521: tathā parasya brahmaṇaḥ prakaraṇe 'prāṇabandhanaṃ hi somya manaḥ' iti śrutaḥ prāṇaśabdo vāyuvikāramātraṃ kathamavagamayet /
GSP33brssbh1u:1524: FN: cākrāyaṇarṣirdhanārthī rājño yajñaṃ gatvovāca- he prastotaḥ,
GSP33brssbh1u:1531: bhūteṣvindriyāṇi sūkṣmatvādbhoktṛsāmīpyācca sārāṇi atasteṣāṃ layodayoktyetareṣāmapi tatsiddheḥ śeṣaghaṭanetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:1533: prāṇaḥ paramātmā bandhanamāśrayaḥ svarūpaṃ yasyeti vigrahaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:1536: idamāmananti- 'atha yadataḥ paro jyotirdīpyate viśvataḥpṛṣṭeṣu sarvataḥpṛṣṭeṣvanuttameṣūttameṣu lokeṣvidaṃ vāva tadyadidamasminnantaḥpuruṣe jyotiḥ' (chā. 3.13.7) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1537: tatra saṃśayaḥ-kimiha jyotiḥśabdenādityādi jyotirabhidhīyate kiṃvā paramātmeti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1543: tamo jyotiriti hīmau śabdau parasparapratidvandvī vīṣayau prasiddhau /
GSP33brssbh1u:1547: nahi rūpādihīnaṃ brahma 'dīpyate' iti mukhyāṃ śrutirmahati /
GSP33brssbh1u:1549: nahi carācarabījasya brahmaṇaḥ sarvātmakasya dyaurmaryādā yuktā /
GSP33brssbh1u:1550: kāryasya tu jyotiṣaḥ paricchinnasya dyaurmaryādā syāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:1563: sarvatrāpi gamyamānasya jyotiṣaḥ 'paro divaḥ' ityupāsanārthaḥ pradeśaviśeṣaparigraho na virudhyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:1567: iti ca kaukṣeye jyotiraṣi paraṃ jyotiradhyasyamānaṃ dṛśyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:1573: 'tadetaddṛṣṭaṃ ca śrutaṃ cepyupāsīta' iti ca śruteḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:1579: 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtam' iti chandonirdeśāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:1580: athāpi kathañcitpūrvasminvākye brahma nirdiṣṭaṃ syādevamapi na tasyeha pratyabhijñānamasti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1583: atra punaḥ 'paro divo jyotiḥ' iti dyaurmaryādātvena /
GSP33brssbh1u:1584: tasmātprākṛtaṃ jyotiriha grāhyamityevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ-jyotiriha brahma grāhyam /
GSP33brssbh1u:1587: pūrvasminhi vākye catuṣpādbrahma nirdiṣṭam- 'tāvānasya mahimā tato jyāyāṃśca pūruṣaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:1590: tatra yaccatuṣpādo brahmaṇastripādamṛtaṃ dyusaṃbandhirūpaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ tadeveha dyusaṃbandhānnirdiṣṭamiti pratyabhijñāyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:1591: tatparityajya prākṛtaṃ jyotiḥ kalpayataḥ prakṛtahānāprakṛtaprakriye prasajyeyātām /
GSP33brssbh1u:1595: yattūktam- 'jyotiradīpyate' iti caitau śabdau kārye jyotiṣi prasiddhāviti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1606: tathā sati brahmaṇo 'pi caitanyarūpasya samastajagadavabhāsahetutvādupapanno jyotiḥśabdaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:1607: 'tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti' (kau. 2.5.15)
GSP33brssbh1u:1610: yadapyuktaṃ dyumaryādatvaṃ sarvagatasya brahmaṇo nopapadyata iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1611: atrocyate- sarvagatasyāpi brahmaṇa upāsanārthaḥ pradeśaviśeṣaparigraho na virudhyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:1612: nanuktaṃ niṣpradeśasya brahmaṇaḥ pradeśaviśeṣakalpanā nopapadyata iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1621: auṣṇyaghoṣānumite kaukṣeye kārye jyotiṣyadhyasyamānatvātparamapi divaḥ kāryaṃ jyotireveti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1624: 'dṛṣṭaṃ ca śrutaṃ cetyupāsīta' iti tu pratīkadvārakaṃ dṛṣṭatvaṃ śrutatvaṃ ca bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brssbh1u:1631: yatra tu guṇaviśeṣasaṃbandhaṃ pratīkaviśeṣasaṃbandhaṃ vā brahmopadiśyate,
GSP33brssbh1u:1632: tatra saṃsāragocarāṇyevoccāvacāni phalāni dṛśyante- 'annādo vasudāno vidante vasu ya evaṃ veda' (bṛ. 4.4.24)
GSP33brssbh1u:1634: yadyapi na svavākye kiñcijjyotiṣo brahmaliṅgamasti tathāpi pūrvasminvākye dṛśyamānaṃ grahītavyaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssbh1u:1635: taduktaṃ sūtrakāreṇa- 'jyotiścaraṇābhidhānāt' iti kathaṃ punarvākyāntaragatena brahmasaṃnidhānena jyotiḥśrutiḥ svaviṣayācchakyā pracyāvayitum
GSP33brssbh1u:1637: 'yadataḥ paro jyotiḥ' iti prathamatarapaṭhitena yacchabdena sarvanāmnā dyusaṃbnandhātpratyabhijñāyamāne
GSP33brssbh1u:1638: pūrvavākyanirdiṣṭe brahmaṇi svasāmārthyena parāmṛṣṭe satyarthājjyotiḥśabdasyāpi brahmaviṣayatvopapatteḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:1646: tāsāṃ tejobannānāmekaikaṃ dvidhā vibhajya punaścekaikaṃ bhāgaṃ dvedhā kṛtvā svabhāgāditarabhāgayornikṣipya trivṛtkaraṇaṃ saṃpadyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:1648: ekatvasāmyādbhūrityasminnakṣare prajāpateḥ śirodṛṣṭiruktā tathātrāpi sārūpyaṃ vācyaṃ anyathādhyāsāsiddheḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:1659: kaukṣeyakaṃ hi jyotirjīvabhāvenānupraviṣṭasya paramātmano vikāraḥ jīvābhāve dehasya śaithilyāt jīvataścauṣṇyājjāyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:1663: vasu hiraṇyaṃ karmaphalaṃ dadātīti vasudāna iti guṇaviśeṣasaṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:1664: sarvanāmnā svasāmarthyena svasya sarvanāmnaḥ sāmartyaṃ saṃnihitavācitvaṃ tadbalena parāmṛṣṭe satīti yojanā /
GSP33brssbh1u:1665: chando 'bhidhānān neti cen na tathā ceto'rpaṇanigadāt tathā hi darśanam / BBs_1,1.25 /
GSP33brssbh1u:1666: atha yaduktaṃ pūrvasminnapi vākye na brahmabhihitamiti,
GSP33brssbh1u:1667: 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtaṃ yadidaṃ kiñca' (chāṃ. 3.12.1)
GSP33brssbh1u:1673: 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvam' iti gāyatrīmupakramya tāmeva bhūtapṛthivīśarīrahṛdayavākyapramāṇabhedairvyakhyāya
GSP33brssbh1u:1674: 'saiṣā catuṣpādā ṣaḍvidhā gāyatrī tadetadṛcābhyanuktaṃ tāvānasya mahimā' iti tasyāmeva
GSP33brssbh1u:1677: iti brahmaśabdaḥ so 'pi chandasaḥ prakṛtatvācchandoviṣaya eva 'ya etāmevaṃ brahmopaniṣadaṃ veda' (chāṃ 3.11.3)
GSP33brssbh1u:1681: 'tathā cetorpaṇanigahāt' tathā gāyatryākhyacchandodvāreṇa tadanugate brahmaṇi cetasor'paṇaṃ cittasamādhānamanena brahmaṇavākyena nigadyate- 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvam' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1686: tathānyatrāpi vikāradvāreṇa brahmaṇa upāsanaṃ dṛśyate- 'etaṃ hyeva bahvṛcā mahatyukthe mīmāṃsanta etamagnāvadhvaryava etaṃ mahāvrate chandogāḥ' (ai.ā. 3.23.12) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1689: apara āha- sākṣādeva gāyatrīśabdena brahma pratipādyate,
GSP33brssbh1u:1691: yathā gāyatrī catuṣpadā ṣaḍakṣaraiḥ pādaistathā brahma catuṣpāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:1693: tadyathā- 'te vā ete pañcānye pañcānye daśa santastatkṛtam' ityupakramyāha 'saiṣā virāḍannādi' (chā. 4.3.8) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1696: FN: ya etāṃ prakṛtāṃ brahmopaniṣadaṃ vedarahasyaṃ madhuvidyārūpaṃ veda tasyodayāstamayarahitabrahmaprāptirbhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:1698: adhvaryavo yajurvedinaḥ kratau chandogāḥ sāmavedino mahāvrate kratau /
GSP33brssbh1u:1702: pañcānye ādhyātmikāste militvā daśa santaḥ kṛtamityucyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:1708: bhūtapṛthivīśarīrahṛdayāni hi nirdiśyāha- 'saiṣā catuṣpadā ṣaḍvidhā gāyatrī' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1709: nahi brahmānāśrayaṇe kevalasya chandaso bhūtādayaḥ pādā upapadyante /
GSP33brssbh1u:1715: smṛtiśca brahmaṇa evaṃrūpatāṃ darśayati- 'viṣṭabhyāhamidaṃ kṛtsnamekāṃśena sthito jagat' (bhaga. 10.42) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1717: iti ca nirdeśa evaṃ sati mukhyārtha upapadyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:1719: iti ca hṛdayasuṣiṣu brahmapuruṣaśrutirbrahmasaṃbandhitāyāṃ vivakṣitāyāṃ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssbh1u:1721: tadeva brahma jyotirvākye dyusaṃbandhātpratyabhijñāyamānaṃ parāmṛśyata iti sthitam // 26 // @----------------------
GSP33brssbh1u:1722: FN: bhūtapṛthivīśarīrahṛdayavākprāṇa iti ṣaṭprakārā gāyatryākhyasya brahmaṇaḥ śrūyante /
GSP33brssbh1u:1724: upadeśabhedān neti cen nobhayasminn apy avirodhāt / BBs_1,1.27 /
GSP33brssbh1u:1725: yadapyetaduktaṃ pūrvatra- 'tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi' iti saptamyā dyaurādhāratvenopadiṣṭā iti,
GSP33brssbh1u:1726: punaḥ 'atha yadataḥ paro divaḥ' iti pañcamyā maryādātvena,
GSP33brssbh1u:1731: ubhayasminnapi saptamyante pañcamyante copadeśe na pratyabhijñānaṃ virudhyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:1732: yathā loke vṛkṣāgrasaṃbaddho 'pi śyena ubhayathopadiśyamāno dṛśyate,
GSP33brssbh1u:1733: vṛkṣāgre śyeno vṛkṣāgrātparataḥ śyena iti ca /
GSP33brssbh1u:1735: apara āha- yathā loke vṛkṣāgreṇāsaṃbaddho 'pi śyena ubhayathopadiśyamāno dṛśyate,
GSP33brssbh1u:1736: vṛkṣāgre śyeno vṛkṣāgrātpurataḥ śyena iti ca /
GSP33brssbh1u:1737: evaṃ ca divaḥ paramapi sadbrahma divītyupadiśyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:1742: asti kauṣītakibrāhmaṇopaniṣadīndrapratardanākhyāyikā- 'pratardano ha vai daivodāsirindrasya priyaṃ dhāmopajagāma yuddhena ca pauruṣeṇa ca' ityārabhyāmnātā
GSP33brssbh1u:1743: tasyāṃ śrūyate- 'sa hovāca praṇo 'smi prajñātmā taṃ māmāyuramṛtamityupāḥsva' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:1744: tathottaratrāpi 'atha khalu prāṇa eva prajñātmedaṃ śarīraṃ parigṛhyotthāpayati' (ko. 1.1,2,3) iti /

GSP33brssbh1u:2068: arbhakaustvāt tadvyapadeśāc ca neti cen na nicāyyatvād evaṃ vyomavac ca / BBs_1,2.7 /
GSP33brssbh1u:2076: sarvagatasya tu sarvadeśeṣu vidyamānatvātparicchinnadeśavyapadeśo 'pi kayācidapekṣayā saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2077: yathā samastavasudhādhipatirapi hi sannayodhyādhipatiriti vyapadiśyate kayā punarapekṣayā sarvagataḥ sannīśvaror'bhakaukā aṇīyāṃśca vyapadiśyata iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2079: evamaṇīyastvādiguṇagaṇopeta īśvarastatra hṛdayapuṇḍarīke nicāyyo draṣṭavya upadiśyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2086: tadevaṃ nicāyyatvāpekṣaṃ brahmaṇor'bhakaukastvamaṇīyastvaṃ ca na pāramārthikam /
GSP33brssbh1u:2088: hṛdayāyatanatvādbrahmaṇo hṛdayāyatanānāṃ ca pratiśarīraṃ bhinnatvādbhinnāyatanānāṃ ca śukādīnāmanekatvasāvayavatvānityatvādidoṣadarśanādbrahmaṇo 'pi tatprasaṅga iti,
GSP33brssbh1u:2093: saṃbhogaprāptir iti cen na vaiśeṣyāt / BBs_1,2.8 /
GSP33brssbh1u:2111: yadapyekatvādbrahmaṇa ātmāntarābhāvāccharīrasya bhogena brahṇo bhogaprasaṅga iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2115: yathāśāstraṃ tarhi śāstrīyor'thaḥ pratipattavyo na tatrārdhajaratīyaṃ labhyam /
GSP33brssbh1u:2116: śāstraṃ ca tattvamasi ityapahatapāpmatvādiviśeṣaṇaṃ brahma śārīrasyātmatvenopadiśacchārīrasyaiva tāvadupabhoktṛtvaṃ vārayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2118: athāgṛhītaṃ śārīrasya brahmaṇaikatvaṃ tadā mithyājñānanimittaḥ śārīrasyopabhogaḥ,
GSP33brssbh1u:2120: nahi bālaistalamalinatādibhirvyomni vikalpyamāne talamalitādiviśiṣṭameva paramārthato vyoma bhavati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2135: ardhaṃmukhamātraṃ jaratyā buddhāyāḥ kāmayate nāṅāgānīti so 'yamardhajaratīnyāyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2136: manomayatvādiviśiṣṭasyaiveśvarasya dhyānārthaṃ hārdatve 'pi nirdeṣatvāttasminneva śāṇḍilyavidyāvidye sarvaṃ ityādivākyaṃ samanvitamityarthaḥ
GSP33brssbh1u:2139: kaṭhavallīṣu paṭhyate- 'yasya brahma ca kṣatraṃ cobhe bhavata odanaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2140: mṛtyūryasyopasevanaṃ ka ityā veda yatra saḥ' (1.2.24) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2155: iti darśanādityevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ- attātra paramātmā bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2158: tādṛśasya cādyasya na paramātmano 'nyaḥ kārtsyenāttā saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2172: FN: yasya paramātmano brahma kṣatraṃ cobhe jātī prasiddhānnavadodanau bhavataḥ,
GSP33brssbh1u:2175: taṃ nirviśeṣamātmānaṃ 'nāvirato duścaritāt' iti mantroktopāyavānyathā veda itthā itthamanyastadrahito na vedetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2185: 'ka itthā veda yatra saḥ' iti ca durvijñānatvaṃ paramātmaliṅgam // 10 //
GSP33brssbh1u:2187: guhāṃ praviṣṭāv ātmānau hi taddarśanāt / BBs_1,2.11 /
GSP33brssbh1u:2188: kaṭhavallīṣveva paṭhyate- 'ṛtaṃ pibantau loke guhāṃ praviṣṭau parame parārdhe /
GSP33brssbh1u:2189: chāyātapau brahmavido vadanti pañṭagnayo ye ca triṇāciketāḥ' (kāṭha. 1.3.1) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2198: atha jīvaparamātmānau tato jīvādvilakṣaṇaḥ paramātmā pratipādito bhavati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2206: iti ca dvivacanena dvayoḥ pānaṃ darśayati śrutiḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2229: naca sati saṃbhavesarvagatasya brahmaṇo viśiṣṭadeśatvaṃ yuktaṃ kalpayitum /
GSP33brssbh1u:2231: paramātmā tu na sukṛtasya vā duṣkṛtasya vā gocare vartate,
GSP33brssbh1u:2232: 'na karmaṇā vardhate no kanīyān' iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2236: kasmāt, ātmānau hi tāvubhāvapi cetanau samānasvabhāvau /
GSP33brssbh1u:2240: tadiha ṛtapānena liṅgena niścite vijñānātmani dvitīyānveṣaṇāyāṃ samānasvabhāvaścetanaḥ paramātmaiva pratīyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2243: guhāhitatvaṃ tu śrutismṛtiṣvasakṛtparamātmana eva dṛśyate- 'guhāhitaṃ gahvareṣṭhaṃ purāṇam' (kāṭha. 1.2.12)
GSP33brssbh1u:2246: sarvagatasyāpi brahmaṇa upalabdhyartho deśaviśeṣopadeśo na virudhyata ityedapyuktameva /
GSP33brssbh1u:2255: bhuñjānau sukṛtasya loke samyagarjitasyādṛṣṭasya kārye dehe vartamāno parasya brahmaṇor'dhaṃ
GSP33brssbh1u:2256: sthānamarhatīti parārdhaṃ hṛdayaṃ tasminparame śreṣṭhe yā guhā nabhokṣaṇā tāṃ praviśya
GSP33brssbh1u:2260: manuṣye prete mṛtesati yeyaṃ vicikitsā saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2267: svātantryalakṣaṇaṃ hi kartṛtvaṃ tacca pāturiva pāyayiturapyastīti so 'pi kartā /
GSP33brssbh1u:2269: guhāhitaṃ buddhau sthitaṃ gahvare 'nekānarthasaṃkule dehe sthitaṃ,
GSP33brssbh1u:2271: parame vyoman śreṣṭhe hārdākāśe tatra guhāyāṃ buddau /
GSP33brssbh1u:2276: ityādinā pareṇa granthena rathirathādirūpakakalpanayā vijñānātnāṃ rathinaṃ saṃsāramokṣayorgantāraṃ kalpayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2280: adhyātmayogādhigamena devaṃ matvā dhīro harṣaśokau jahāti' (kā. 1.2.12)
GSP33brssbh1u:2283: brahmavido vadanti iti ca vaktṛviśeṣopādanaṃ paramātmaparigrahe ghaṭate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2285: eṣa eva nyāyaḥ 'dvā suparṇā sayujā sakhāyā' (muṇḍa. 3.1.1)
GSP33brssbh1u:2290: anantare ca mantre tāveva draṣṭṛdraṣṭavyabhāvena viśinaṣṭi- 'samāne vṛkṣe puruṣo nimagno 'nīśayā śocati muhyamānaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2291: juṣṭaṃ yadā paśyatyanyamīśamasya mahimānamiti vītaśokaḥ' (muṇḍa. 3.1.2) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2292: apara āha- 'dvā suparṇā' iti neyamṛgasyādhikaraṇasya siddhāntaṃ bhajate,
GSP33brssbh1u:2294: 'tayoranyaḥ pippalaṃ svādittīti sattvamanaś nannanyo 'bhicākaśītītyanaś nannanyo 'bhipaśyati jñastāvetau sattvakṣetrajñau' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2298: tatraiva ca vyākhyātatvāt- 'tadetatsattvaṃ yena svapnaṃ paśyati,
GSP33brssbh1u:2299: atha yo 'yaṃ śārīra upadraṣṭā sa kṣetrajñastāvetau sattvakṣetrajñau' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2301: nahyatra śārīraḥ kṣetrajñaḥ kartṛtvabhoktṛtvādinā saṃsāradharmeṇopeto vivakṣyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2307: tāvetau sattvakṣetrajñau na ha vā evaṃvidi kiñcana raca ādhvaṃsate ityādi /
GSP33brssbh1u:2308: kathaṃ punarasminpakṣe tayoranyaḥ pippalaṃ svādittīti sattvam ityacetane sattve bhoktṛtvāvacanamti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2309: ucyate- neyaṃ śrutiracetanasya sattvasya bhoktṛtvaṃ vakṣyāmīti pravṛttā /
GSP33brssbh1u:2310: kiṃ tarhi cetanasya kṣetrajñasyābhoktṛtvaṃ brahmasbhāvatāṃ ca vakṣyāmīti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2312: idaṃ hi kartṛtvaṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ ta sattvakṣetrajñayoritaretisvabhāvāvivekakṛtaṃ kalpyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2317: tathāca śrutiḥ- 'yatra vā anyadiva syāttatrānyo 'nyatpaśyet' ityādinā svapnadṛṣṭahastyādivyavahāravadavidyāviṣaya eva kartṛtvādivyavahāraṃ darśayati
GSP33brssbh1u:2323: tata eva gūḍhamanupraviṣṭaṃ gahanatāṃ gatamīśvaram adhyātmaprayogaḥ pratyagātmanyeva cittasamādhānaṃ tenādhigamo mahāvākyajā vṛttistayā viditvetyarthaḥ
GSP33brssbh1u:2326: juṣṭaṃ dhyānādinā sevitaṃ yadā dhyānaparipākadaśāyāmīśamanyaṃ viśiṣṭarūpādbhinnaṃ pasyati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2332: anyadivābhāsabhūtaṃ nānātvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ syāttatra avidyakabuddhyādisaṃbandhādanyo bhūtvānyacakṣuṣā paśyet /
GSP33brssbh1u:2337: 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyata eṣa ātmeti hovācaitadamṛtamabhayametadbrahmeti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2338: etadyapyasminsarpirvodakaṃ vā siñcati vartmani eva gacchati' (chā. 4.15.1)
GSP33brssbh1u:2340: tatra saṃśayaḥ kimayaṃ pratibimbātmakṣyadhikaraṇo nirdiśyate 'thavā vijñānātmā uta devatātmendriyasyādhiṣṭhātāthaveśvara iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2344: 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyate' iti ca prasiddavadupadeśāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:2346: sa hi cakṣuṣā rūpaṃ paśyaṃścakṣuṣi saṃnihito bhavati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2362: 'tadyadyapyasminsarpirvodakaṃ vā siñcati vartmani eva gacchati' iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2364: 'etaṃ saṃyaddhāma ityācakṣate etaṃ hi sarvāṇi vāmānyabhisaṃyanti' /
GSP33brssbh1u:2365: 'eṣa u eva vāmanīreṣa hi sarvāṇi vāmāni nayati' /
GSP33brssbh1u:2366: ' eṣa u eva bhāmānīreṣa hi sarveṣu lokeṣu bhāti' (chā. 4.15.2,3,4) iti ca /
GSP33brssbh1u:2379: santi hyanyānyapi pṛthivyādīni sthānānyasya nirdiṣṭāni- 'yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhan' (bṛ. 3.7.3) ityādinā /
GSP33brssbh1u:2380: teṣu hi cakṣurapi nirdiṣṭam- 'yaścakṣuṣi tiṣṭhan' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2381: 'sthānādivyapadeśāt' ityādigrahaṇenaitaddarśayati- na kevalaṃ sthānamevaikamanucitaṃ brahmaṇo nirdiśyamānaṃ dṛśyate,
GSP33brssbh1u:2382: kiṃ tarhi nāmarūpamityevañjātīyakamapyanāmarūpasya brahmaṇo 'nucitaṃ nirdiśyamānaṃ dṛśyate- 'tasyoditi nāma' 'hiraṇyaśmaśruḥ' (chā. 1.6.7,6) ityādi /
GSP33brssbh1u:2383: nirguṇamapi sadbrahma nāmarūpagatairguṇaiḥ saguṇamupāsanārthaṃ tatra tatropadiśyata ityetadapyuktameva /
GSP33brssbh1u:2384: sarvagatasyāpi brahmaṇa upalabdhyarthaṃ sthānaviśeṣo na virudhyate,
GSP33brssbh1u:2386: FN: sthānādanyādayo yeṣāṃ te sthānādayo nāmarūpaprakārāsteṣāṃ vyapadeśātsarvaṅgatasyaikasthānaniyamo nāvakalpate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2391: sukhaviśiṣṭaṃ hi brahma yadvākyopakrame prakrāntaṃ 'prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahma' iti tadevehābhihitaṃ,
GSP33brssbh1u:2395: kathaṃ punarvākyopakrame sukhaviśiṣṭaṃ brahma vijñāyata iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2396: ucyate- 'prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahma' ityetadagnīnāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvopakosala uvāca- 'vijānāmyahaṃ yatprāṇo brahma kaṃ ca tu khaṃ ca na vijānāmi' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2397: tatredaṃ prativacanam- 'yadvāva kaṃ tadeva khaṃ yadeva khaṃ tadeva kaṃ' (chā. 4.10.5)
GSP33brssbh1u:2400: yadi tasya viśeṣaṇatvena kaṃśabdaḥ sukhavācī nopādīyeta /
GSP33brssbh1u:2401: tathā sati kevale bhūtākāśe brahmaśabdo nāmādiṣviva pratīkābhiprāyeṇa prayukta iti pratītiḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:2402: tathā kaṃśabdasya viṣayendriyasaṃparkajanite sāmaye sukhe prasiddhatvāt,
GSP33brssbh1u:2405: itaretaraviśeṣatau tu kaṅkhaṃśabdau sukhātmakaṃ brahma gamayataḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2406: tatra dvitīye brahmaśabde 'nupādīyamāne kaṃ khaṃ brahmetyevocyamāne kaṃśabdasya viśeṣaṇatvenaivopayuktatvātasukhasya guṇasyādhyeyatvaṃ syāt,
GSP33brssbh1u:2407: tanmā bhūdityubhayoḥ kaṅkhaṃśabdayorbrahmaśabdaśirastvaṃ 'kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahma' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2410: pratyekaṃ ca gārhapatyādayo 'gnayaḥ svaṃ svaṃ mahimānamupadiśya 'eṣā somya te 'smadvidyātmavidyā ca' ityupasaṃharantaḥ pūrvatra brahma nirdiṣṭamiti jñāpayanti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2411: 'ācāryastu te gatiṃ vaktā' iti ca gatimātrābhidhānapratijñānamarthāntaravivakṣāṃ vārayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2412: 'yathā puṣkarapalāśā āpo na śliṣyanta evamevaṃvidi pāpaṃ karma na śliṣyate' (chā. 4.14.3)
GSP33brssbh1u:2413: iti cākṣisthānaṃ puruṣaṃ vijānataḥ pāpenānupaghātaṃ bruvannakṣisthānasya puruṣasya brahmatvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2415: tadvido gatiṃ vakṣyāmītyupakramate- 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyata eṣa ātmeti hovāca'
GSP33brssbh1u:2421: brahmapadaṃ śiro yayoste brahmaśirasī tayorbhāvo brahmaśirastvam /
GSP33brssbh1u:2424: yasmācchrutopaniṣatkasya śrutarahasyavijñānasya brahmavido yā gatirdevayānākhyā prasiddhā
GSP33brssbh1u:2428: tatra prayātā gacchanti brahma brahmavido janāḥ' (gī. 8.24) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2430: 'atha yadu caivāsmiñchavyaṃ kurvanti yadi ca nārciṣamevābhisaṃbhavanti' ityupakramya
GSP33brssbh1u:2431: 'ādityāccandramasaṃ candramaso vidyutaṃ tatpuruṣo 'mānavaḥ sa enānbrahma gamayatyeva
GSP33brssbh1u:2432: devapatho brahmapatha etena pratipadyamānā imaṃ mānavamāvarte nāvartante' (chā. 4.17.5) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2433: tadiha brahmavidviṣayā prasiddhayā gatyākṣisthānasya brahmatvaṃ niścīyate // 16 // @----------------------
GSP33brssbh1u:2436: asminnupāsake mṛte putrādayaḥ śavyaṃ śavasaṃbandhi saṃskārādikarma kurvanti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2446: yadaiva hi kaścitpuruṣaścakṣurāsīdati tadā cakṣuṣi puruṣacchāyā dṛśyate,
GSP33brssbh1u:2448: 'ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣaḥ' iti ca śrutiḥ saṃnidhānātsvacakṣuṣi dṛśyamānaṃ puruṣamupāsyatvenopadiśati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2449: nacopāsanākāle chāyākaraṃ kañcitpuruṣaṃ cakṣuḥsamīpe saṃnidhāpyopāsta iti yuktaṃ kalpayitum /
GSP33brssbh1u:2452: asaṃbhavācca tasminnamṛtatvādīnāṃ guṇānāṃ na chāyātmani pratītiḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2453: tathā vijñānātmano 'pi sādhāraṇe kṛtsnaśarīrendriyasaṃbandhe sati cakṣuṣyevāvasthitatvaṃ vaktuṃ na śakyam /
GSP33brssbh1u:2459: devatātmanastu 'raśmibhireṣo 'sminpratiṣṭhitaḥ' iti śruteryadyapi cakṣuṣyavasthānaṃ syāttathāpyātmatvaṃ tāvanna saṃbhavati,
GSP33brssbh1u:2469: asmiṃśca pakṣe dṛśyata iti prasiddhavadupādānaṃ śāstrādyapekṣaṃ vidvadviṣayaṃ prarocanārthamiti vyākhyeyam // 17 // @----------------------
GSP33brssbh1u:2475: uktāpekṣayā pañcamo mṛtyuḥ samāptāyuṣāṃ nikaṭe dhāvatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:2478: 'ya imaṃ ca lokaṃ paraṃ ca lokaṃ sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni yo 'ntaro yamayati' ityupakramya
GSP33brssbh1u:2479: śrūyate- 'yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhanpṛthivyā antaro yaṃ pṛthivī na veda yasya pṛthivī
GSP33brssbh1u:2480: śarīraṃ yaḥ pṛthivīmantaro yamayatyeṣa ta ātmāntaryāmyamṛtaḥ' (bṛha. 3.7.1,2) ityādi /
GSP33brssbh1u:2482: sa kimadhidaivādyabhimānī devatātmā kaścitkiṃvā prāptāṇimādyaiśvaryaḥ kaścidyogī kiṃvā paramātmā kiṃvārthāntaraṃ kiñcidityapūrvasaṃjñādarśanātmasaṃśayaḥ
GSP33brssbh1u:2488: tathāca śrūyate- 'pṛthivyeva yasyāyatanamagnirloko mano jyotiḥ' (bṛ. 3.9.10) ityādi /
GSP33brssbh1u:2490: yogino vā kasyacitsiddhasya sarvānupraveśena yamayitṛtvaṃ syāt,
GSP33brssbh1u:2492: akāryakaraṇatvādityevaṃ prāpta idamucyate- yo 'ntaryāmyadhidaivādiṣu śrūyate sa paramātmaiva syānnānya iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:2494: tasya hi paramātmano dharmā iha nirdiśyamānā dṛśyante /
GSP33brssbh1u:2495: pṛthivyādi tāvadadhidaivatādibhedabhinnaṃ samastaṃ vikārajātamantastiṣṭanyamayatīti paramātmano yamayitṛtvaṃ dharma upapadyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:2497: eṣa ta 'ātmāntaryāmyamṛtaḥ' iti cātmatvāmṛtatve mukhye paramātmana upapadyete /
GSP33brssbh1u:2498: 'yaṃ pṛthivī na veda' iti ca pṛthivīdevatāyā avijñeyamantaryāmiṇaṃ bruvandevatātmano 'nyamantaryāmiṇaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2522: ata uttaramucyate- naca smārte pradhānamantaryāmiśabdaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssbh1u:2524: yadyapyadṛṣṭatvādivyapadeśaḥ pradhānasyasaṃbhavati tathāpi na draṣṭṛtvādivyapeśaḥ saṃbhavati,
GSP33brssbh1u:2531: śārīro hi cetanatvāddraṣṭā śrotā mantā vijñātā ca bhavati,
GSP33brssbh1u:2534: adṛṣṭatvādayaśca dharmāḥ śārīre parasiddhāḥ darśanādikriyāyāḥ kartari pravṛttivirodhāt /
GSP33brssbh1u:2544: śarīraś cobhaye 'pi hi bhedenainam adhīyate / BBs_1,2.20 /

GSP33brssbh1u:3529: saṃprasādaśabdoditaṃ jīvaṃ 'svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate' iti brahmasvarūpāpannaṃ darśayanna
GSP33brssbh1u:3531: kecittu paramātmavivakṣāyāṃ 'etaṃ tveva te' iti jīvākarṣaṇamanyāyyaṃ manyamānā etameva vākyopakramasūcitamapahatapāpmatvādiguṇakamātmānaṃ te bhūyo 'nuvyākhyāsyāmīti kalpayanti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3535: 'etaṃ tveva te' iti ca pratijñāya prākcaturthātparyāyādanyamanyaṃ vyācakṣāṇasya prajāpateḥ pratārakatvaṃ prasajyeta /
GSP33brssbh1u:3537: tadvilayanena tadviparītamapahatapāpmatvādiguṇakaṃ pārameśvaraṃ svarūpaṃ vidyayā pratipādyate,
GSP33brssbh1u:3539: apare tu vādinaḥ pāramārthikameva jaivaṃ rūpamiti manyante 'smadīyāśca kecit /
GSP33brssbh1u:3541: eka eva parameśvaraḥ kūṭasthanityo vijñānadhāturavidyayā māyayā māyāvivadanekadhā vibhāvyate nānyo vijñānadhāturastīti /
GSP33brssbh1u:3542: yattvidaṃ parameśvaravākye jīvamāśaṅkhya pratiṣedhati sūtrakāraḥ - 'nāsaṃbhavāt' (bra.1.3.18) ityādinā /
GSP33brssbh1u:3543: tatrāyamabhiprāyaḥ - nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāve kūṭasthanitye ekasminnasaṅge paramātmani tadviparītaṃ jaivaṃ rūpaṃ vyomnīva talamalādiparikalpitam
GSP33brssbh1u:3545: jīvasya tu na parasmādanyatvaṃ pratipipādayiṣati kiṃ tvanuvadatyevāvidyākalpitaṃ lokaprasiddhaṃ jīvabhedam /
GSP33brssbh1u:3546: evaṃ hi svābhāvikakartṛtvabhoktṛtvānuvādena pravṛttāḥ karmavidhayo na virudhyanta iti manyate /

GSP33brssbh1u:3550: tadyatreti suṣuptiparyāye ca jīvameva prajāpatirvyācaṣṭa ityanvayaḥ /

GSP33brssbh1u:3578: yadasyopasaṃpattavyaṃ paraṃ jyotiryena svena rūpeṇāyamabhiniṣpadyate sa eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmatvādiguṇa

GSP33brssbh1u:3592: yatra yaṃ bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ yasya ca bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti sa kiṃ tejodhātuḥ kaściduta prājña ātmeti vicikitsāyāṃ tejodhāturiti tāvatprāptam
GSP33brssbh1u:3594: tejaḥsvabhāvakaṃ hi candratārakādi tejaḥsvabhāvaka eva suryo bhāsamāne 'hani na bhāsata iti prasiddham /
GSP33brssbh1u:3595: tathā saha sūryeṇa sarvamidaṃ candratārakādi yasminna bhāsate so 'pi tejaḥsvabhāva eva kaścidityavagamyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:3599: tasmāttejodhātuḥ kaścidityevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - prājña evātmā bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssbh1u:3608: samatvācca tejodhātūnāṃ sūryādīnāṃ na tejodhātumanyaṃ pratyapekṣāsti yaṃ bhāntamanubhāyuḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:3616: tasya ceti caturthaṃ pādamasya ślokasya sūcayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:3617: 'tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti' iti tadhetukaṃ bhānaṃ sūryāderucyamānaṃ prājñamātmānaṃ gamayati /
GSP33brssbh1u:3622: athavā na sūryādīnameva ślokaparipaṭhitānāmidaṃ taddhetukaṃ vibhānamucyate /
GSP33brssbh1u:3623: kiṃ tarhi 'sarvamidam' ityaviśeṣaśruteḥ sarvasyaivāsya nāmarūpakriyākārakaphalajātasya yābhivyaktiḥ sā brahmajyotiḥsattānimittā /
GSP33brssbh1u:3625: 'na tatra sūryo bhāti' iti ca tatraśabdamāharanprakṛtagrahaṇaṃ darśayati /

GSP33brssbh1u:3627: anantaraṃ ca 'hiraṇmaye pare kośe virajaṃ brahma niṣphalam /

GSP33brssbh1u:3631: tatra tu sa eva tejodhāturanyo na saṃbhavatītyupapāditam /

GSP33brssbh1u:3663: nahi parameśvaro balādyamena niṣkraṣṭuṃ śakyastena tatra saṃsāryaṅguṣṭhamātro niścitaḥ

GSP33brssbh1u:3871: dvirgośabda uccārita iti hi pratipattirna tu dvau gośabdāviti /

GSP33brssbh1u:3873: atrābhidhīyate- sati varṇaviṣaye niścite pratyabhijñāne saṃyogavibhāgābhivyaṅgyatvādvarṇānāmabhivyañjakavaicitryanimitto 'yaṃ varṇaviṣayo vicitraḥ pratyayo na svarūpanimittaḥ /

GSP33brssbh1u:5448: tathānyatrāpi 'kasminnu bhagavo vijñāte sarvamidaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavati (muṇḍa. 1.1.2)
GSP33brssbh1u:5452: tathā 'ātmani kalvare dṛṣṭe śrute mate vijñāta idaṃ sarvaṃ viditam' iti pratijñā /
GSP33brssbh1u:5453: 'sa yathā dundubherhanyamānasya na bāhyāñśabdāñśaknuyādgrahaṇāya dundubhestu grahaṇena dundubhyāghātasya vā śabdo gṛhītaḥ' (bṛ. 4.5.6,7)
GSP33brssbh1u:5455: evaṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ prativedāntaṃ pratijñādṛṣṭāntau prakṛtitvasādhanau pratyetavyau /
GSP33brssbh1u:5456: yata itīyaṃ pañcamī 'yato vā imāni bhūtāni jāyante' ityatra 'janikartuḥ prakṛtiḥ' (pā.sū. 1.4.30)
GSP33brssbh1u:5459: yathā hi loke mṛtsuvarṇādikamupādānakāraṇaṃ kulālasuvarṇakārādīnadhiṣṭhātṛnapekṣya pravartate naivaṃ brahmaṇa upādānakāraṇasya sato 'nyo 'dhiṣṭhātāpekṣyo
GSP33brssbh1u:5472: dundubhyāghātasya janakasya janyatayā saṃbandhī vā śabdo viśeṣaśabda ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:5474: abhidhyopadeśaścātmanaḥ kartṛtvaprakṛtitve gamayati 'so 'kāmayata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti' 'tadaikṣata bahu syāṃ prajāyeya' iti ca /
GSP33brssbh1u:5481: yatkāraṇaṃ sākṣādbrahmaiva kāraṇamupādāyobhau prabhavapralayāvāmnāyate- 'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtānyākāśādeva samutpadyante /
GSP33brssbh1u:5483: yaddhi yasmātprabhavati yasmiṃśca pralīyate tattasyopādānaṃ prasiddham /
GSP33brssbh1u:5494: kathaṃ punaḥ pūrvasiddhasya sataḥ kartṛtvena vyavasthitasya kriyamāṇatvaṃ śakyaṃ saṃpādayitum /
GSP33brssbh1u:5496: pūrvasiddho 'pi hi sannātmā viśeṣeṇa vikārātmanā pariṇamayāmāsātmānamiti /
GSP33brssbh1u:5501: yatkāraṇaṃ brahmaṇa eva vikārātmanā pariṇāmaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyenāmnāyate 'sacca tyaccābhavat /
GSP33brssbh1u:5509: itaśca prakṛtirbrahma yonirityapi paṭhyate vedānteṣu 'kartāramīśaṃ puruṣaṃ brahmayonim' (muṇḍa. 3.1.3)
GSP33brssbh1u:5511: yoniśabdaśca prakṛtivacanaḥ samadhigato loke 'pṛthivī yoniroṣadhivanaspatīnām' iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:5513: kacitsthānavacano 'pi yoniśabdo dṛṣṭaḥ - 'yoniṣṭa indra niṣade akāri' (ṛ.saṃ. 1.104.1) iti /
GSP33brssbh1u:5514: vākyaśeṣāttvatra prakṛtivacanatā parigṛhyate 'yathorṇanābhiḥ sṛjate gṛhyate ca' (muṇḍa. 1.1.7)
GSP33brssbh1u:5517: yatpunaridamuktamīkṣāpūrvakaṃ kartṛtvaṃ nimittakāraṇeṣveva kulālādiṣu loke dṛṣṭaṃ nopādāneṣvityādi,
GSP33brssbh1u:5528: he indra, te tava niṣade upaveśanāya yoniḥ sthānaṃ mayā akāri kṛtam /
GSP33brssbh1u:5532: ityārabhya pradhānakāraṇavādaḥ sūtraireva punaḥ punarāśaṅkya nirākṛtaḥ,
GSP33brssbh1u:5533: tasya hi pakṣasyopodbalakāni kānicilliṅgābhāsāni vedānteṣvāpātena mandamatīnpratibhāntīti /
GSP33brssbh1u:5539: ataḥ pradhānamallanibarhaṇanyāyenātidiśati- etena pradhānakāraṇavādapratiṣedhanyāyakalāpena sarve 'ṇvādikāraṇavādā api pratiṣiddhatayā vyākhyātā veditavyāḥ /
GSP33brssbh1u:5542: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīmacchaṅkarabhagavatpūjyapādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣye prathamādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ //
